desc: Make every day extraordinary with KNT: a LA-based jewelry brand creating the pieces you’ve been searching for but could never find. Until now, we have been delivering the best shopping experience for jewelry lovers worldwide.

layout.text:
KNT is an ideal jewelry brand dedicated to individuals who have chosen to live on their own terms and not follow the status quo.
KNT represents a movement of newly awakened minds who have dared to stand out and be unique by not sticking to social conformity. KNT seeks to lead the change in providing jewelry enthusiasts with high-quality, affordable sparking stone without the heavy price tag and societal indoctrination.
